value.name: Two years after Virginia Beach mass shooting, police chaplain reflects on the healing process
value.description: Two years after a mass shooting rocked the City of Virginia Beach workforce and surrounding community, a police chaplain says it’s evident to him that healing is far from over.

value.name: Review finds use of force justified in Va. Beach shooting
value.description: Nearly two years after a mass shooting at a municipal building in Virginia Beach, a prosecutor has determined the officers who fired on the gunman were justified in their use of deadly force. In a letter late last week to Police Chief Paul Neudigate,

value.name: Report: Officers justified in use of deadly force against Virginia Beach mass shooter
value.description: In it, Commonwealth's Attorney Colin Stolle laid out the details of his independent investigation into Dewayne Craddock's death as well as a review of the Virginia Beach police investigation.
